sentences: Luis Mariano Rivera (1906-2002) was a Venezuelan singer, composer, poet, and dramatist.
He was born on August 19, 1906 and was a self-taught musician.

He wrote hundreds of songs that have been performed by musicians including Morella Muñoz, Jesús Sevillano, Gualberto Ibarreto, Juan Carlos Salazar, Cecilia Todd, Lilia Vera, Simón Díaz, Serenata Guayanesa and Un Solo Pueblo.
Luis Mariano Rivera died on March 15, 2002.
